messages.author: Oyster Republic
messages.content:
Wow, fellow citizens — over 1.8k unique mints in just 24 hours(https://magiceden.io/marketplace/oypass?search=2), all without an official announcement. This is proof of the strength of our nation. 

We will soon be making the official announcement about the Citizen System, which includes both Passports and Citizen Scores.

 The announcement will be posted here first — make sure to turn on notifications so you don’t miss it.

 React/add your emoji below to let us know you’ve read it! (已编辑)

messages.author: Oyster Republic
messages.content:
Introducing the Oyster Passport 
 Every Republic needs an identity system. For us, that begins with the Oyster Passport — your proof of citizenship. The Passport is more than a collectible — it is your digital identity, unlocking national initiatives, Citizen-only channels, and future rewards. Owning one means you are officially part of the Republic. Already, over 2,400 Passports have been minted in 48 hours — before Twitter announcement. This shows the strength of our community and the nation we’re building together.

Citizen Score
Passports give you identity — Citizen Score gives you recognition. Our Republic has already distributed over $1M in rewards. But unlike the old world of Web3 where influence ruled, Citizen Score ensures quality rises above noise.

Your Score is based on:
 Authenticity — you must be a Citizen (Passport holder) in order to participate. Our system also tracks past and current Twitter behavior to ensure you are a real human, not a bot.

 Expanding the Republic — strengthen our national influence through interactions with official posts and fellow citizens’ posts, and by referring new citizens into the Republic. (New citizens must hold Oyster Republic certified assets — UBS-1 or the Community PFP NFT(Coming Soon)). We also encourage you to create original posts on X/Twitter to spread the nation’s message even further.

 Consistency — steady contributions week after week. (Our system is designed so that consistent Citizens will earn more than influencers who only make a single post.)


Rewards for Citizens
Oyster Score comes with real rewards:
 Perls — weekly payouts tied to your score. 

 Blind Boxes (Coming Soon) — randomized loot: $OYS, airdrops, WL spots, NFTs, bonus Perls, even free devices.

 XP & Levels — build permanent ranks: Citizen → Builder → Guardian → Champion → Legend

 Exclusive Access — higher levels unlock private lounges, governance polls, seasonal drops, and priority in future initiatives.


How to earn
Both the publisher of a qualified post and the citizens who engage with it will earn points toward their Citizen Score.

To amplify your post with the community:

Share your X/Twitter post content in ⁠citizen-tweets and attach the direct link so others can easily engage.
,
Include #OysterRepublic so our system can track it.
,
Wait for Admin or National Guard approval → once they react with a  checkmark, your post is qualified. Only approved posts count toward Citizen Score.
,

Calling National Gaurd
Our Republic is just beginning. Every Citizen has a chance to help shape history. We encourage you to share Oyster Republic widely — but remember: authenticity comes first. To safeguard fairness, we’re introducing the National Guard — a team that reviews posts to ensure only real contributions earn rewards. (Applications are open — DM an admin/moderator if you’d like to join.)

This way, the nation amplifies authentic voices, ensures fair rewards, and builds a Republic for all.
 React below if you’re ready to climb the Oyster Score and shape the future of our nation!

The more you engage, the stronger our nation becomes.

messages.author: Oyster Republic
messages.content:
Season 1 is officially closed. 

All $OYS Points and Node NFT rewards will be able to claim in next week.

$OYS Points won’t come easy anymore — they will serve as the future governance token of the Republic. Only true shareholders will earn them.

If you purchased the UBS-1 phone before the Nov 11 snapshot, you’ll receive an Node NFT. Those who joined the leaderboard will also earn additional Node NFTs based on their ranking.

Season 1 Node NFTs
 Access Node — Purchased UBS-1 before Nov 11, 2025 
 Echo Node — All leaderboard participants  Silver Node — Top 30 %
 Gold Node — Top 10 % 
 Diamond Node — Top 1 %

What is a Node NFT?
A Node NFT is your on-chain ownership badge inside the Republic.
Each Node grants you a share of revenue from Oyster’s national projects — Puffy, GEM(Announcing soon), and more.

The higher your Node tier, the greater your share, influence, and future utility.
Node NFTs = Ownership + Revenue Share + Long-Term Rewards
https://x.com/oysterecosystem/status/1989588044819923111?s=46
